name: The Lost World
description:
The Lost World

Love Rage Games? Love 2D Pixel-art Games? Platformers? If you do then this is the best game for you!

Get it now and enjoy your gaming time with The Lost World!

Controls:

Left Arrow Key - Move Left

Right Arrow Key - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump

R - Restart

P - Screenshot (Files are in %appdata%/The_Lost_House)

Early Access - 20 Levels + 2 Bosses

Why does it cost $1? Because this is still early access and we will try to make it a better 2D Platformer with better physics and better textures!

Sound will be added soon.

Demo has 5 Levels just for test.
